Name: Customer Profile Data
Description: Customer profile, history, and interactions from CRM including demographics, contact information, account relationships, and interaction history

Name: Transaction History
Description: Transaction history and balances from core banking including debits, credits, transfers, payment details, transaction type, amount, timestamp, merchant information, and channel

Name: Loan and Credit Data
Description: Loan history and credit scores from lending platform including application data, approval status, repayment history, and credit bureau scores

Name: Investment Portfolio Data
Description: Portfolio holdings and performance including asset allocations, valuations, returns, and market data

Name: Market and Economic Data
Description: Stock prices, economic indicators, interest rates, and market trends from external data providers

Name: News and Media Intelligence
Description: Company news, industry trends, adverse media, and competitive intelligence from news feeds and social media

Name: Client Meeting Insights
Description: AI-generated client briefings including meeting preparation materials, opportunity lists, talking points, and relationship insights from RM Copilot

Name: Opportunity Scores
Description: Ranked cross-sell/upsell opportunities and propensity scores generated by ML models

Name: CRM Updates
Description: Auto-captured meeting notes, actions, and customer interaction summaries

Name: RM Performance Metrics
Description: Relationship manager productivity, conversion rates, pipeline metrics, and effectiveness KPIs

Name: Financial Close Data
Description: Automated reconciliation results, journal entries, variance analysis, accrual estimates, and P&L/Balance Sheet data

Name: Financial Narratives
Description: AI-generated management commentary, variance explanations, and executive summaries for financial statements

Name: Anomaly Detection Alerts
Description: Identified unusual transactions, posting errors, data quality issues, and financial anomalies

Name: Conversational Analytics Results
Description: Natural language query results, generated insights, automated visualizations, and SQL translations

Name: Predictive Forecasts
Description: ML-generated forecasts including trend analysis, scenario modeling, and predictive insights

Name: Credit Risk Scores
Description: Probability of Default (PD), Loss Given Default (LGD), Exposure at Default (EAD), and credit decision scores

Name: Explainable Credit Decisions
Description: SHAP/LIME feature attributions, counterfactual explanations, and model interpretability reports for credit decisions

Name: Alternative Credit Data
Description: Open banking transaction data, telco payment history, rental payment history, and behavioral financial data

Name: Extracted Document Data
Description: Structured data extracted from loan applications, financial statements, identity documents, contracts, invoices including OCR text, entities, and confidence scores

Name: Document Fraud Signals
Description: Document authenticity verification results, manipulation detection, and forensics analysis

Name: Customer Propensity Scores
Description: Churn propensity, product affinity, engagement likelihood, and life event predictions

Name: Personalized Content
Description: AI-generated personalized messages, emails, offers, push notifications, and marketing content

Name: Customer 360 Features
Description: Real-time customer behavioral features, aggregated signals, and feature store data for ML models

Name: Call Transcripts and Summaries
Description: Real-time call transcriptions, AI-generated call summaries, sentiment analysis, and extracted action items

Name: Agent Assistance Recommendations
Description: Real-time knowledge surfacing, next-best-action suggestions, and compliance monitoring results for agents

Name: Quality Monitoring Scores
Description: Automated quality scoring, compliance adherence tracking, and performance analytics for contact center

Name: Security Events and Threat Intelligence
Description: Security event logs, anomaly detection alerts, threat intelligence feeds, UEBA alerts, and IOC data

Name: Security Incident Reports
Description: Automated incident summaries, threat analysis, security narratives, and SOC investigation results

Name: User Behavior Profiles
Description: ML-based user behavior baselines, risk scores, and anomaly patterns for identity and access management

Name: Data Product Catalog
Description: Metadata, schemas, data lineage, data quality metrics, and semantic information for all data assets

Name: Data Quality Metrics
Description: Automated data quality scores including completeness, accuracy, timeliness, consistency, drift detection, and validation results

Name: Data Contracts and SLAs
Description: Schema definitions, compatibility rules, SLA metrics, and consumer impact assessments

Name: Code and Development Artifacts
Description: AI-generated code, test cases, documentation, architecture diagrams, and security scan results

Name: Development Productivity Metrics
Description: Code quality metrics, velocity indicators, test coverage, and deployment frequency

Name: Financial Crime Alerts
Description: Suspicious Activity Reports (SAR/STR), AML alerts, sanctions screening hits, and EDD findings
Consumed By Use Cases: UC-008, UC-011, UC-014, UC-015, Regulatory Bodies

Name: Name Screening Results
Description: ML-powered fuzzy matching results against sanctions, PEP lists, and adverse media with disposition recommendations

Name: Transaction Monitoring Alerts
Description: Real-time and batch monitoring alerts for suspicious patterns including structuring, layering, and money laundering typologies

Name: Investigation Narratives
Description: AI-generated investigation summaries, evidence packages, and regulatory submission documentation
Consumed By Use Cases: UC-011, UC-013, UC-015, UC-019, Regulatory Bodies

Name: Customer Risk Assessments
Description: ML-based customer risk scores, OCDD monitoring results, and risk factor analysis

Name: Compliance Verification Results
Description: Automated policy compliance checks, regulatory document reviews, gap analysis, and audit evidence

Name: Process Quality Scores
Description: Real-time SLA monitoring, process mining results, quality trend analysis, and exception patterns

Name: Test Results and Coverage
Description: AI-generated test execution results, coverage metrics, defect classifications, and validation outcomes

Name: Fraud Detection Scores
Description: Real-time fraud probability scores for transactions, applications, and accounts with explainable risk factors

Name: Fraud Network Analysis
Description: Graph analytics results identifying fraud rings, mule networks, and coordinated attack patterns

Name: Fraud Case Intelligence
Description: Automated evidence packages, case narratives, pattern matching results, and similar case retrievals

Name: Identity Verification Results
Description: Digital identity verification outcomes including document authenticity, biometric match scores, liveness detection, and risk assessments

Name: Onboarding Application Data
Description: Captured application data, verification status, risk scores, and processing milestones

Name: Operational Risk Indicators
Description: Key Risk Indicators (KRIs), incident data, control effectiveness scores, risk assessments, and early warning signals

Name: Risk Narratives and Reports
Description: GenAI-generated risk reports, board narratives, regulatory submissions, and scenario analysis documentation

Name: Incident and Loss Data
Description: Categorized incident reports, loss event data, root cause analysis, and near-miss information

Name: IT Operations Intelligence
Description: AIOps anomaly alerts, incident predictions, system health metrics, service dependency maps, and capacity forecasts

Name: IT Knowledge Articles
Description: Automated knowledge base content, resolution procedures, troubleshooting guides, and runbook documentation

Name: Ticket Classification and Routing
Description: AI-powered ticket categorizations, priority scores, resolution predictions, and skills-based routing recommendations

Name: Deal Intelligence
Description: AI-powered deal sourcing insights, competitive intelligence, pitch materials, credit memo analysis, and pipeline forecasts

Name: Corporate Structure Data
Description: Beneficial ownership maps, corporate relationship graphs, group exposure data, and ESG risk assessments

Name: Client Analytics
Description: Wallet share analysis, client health scores, product propensity, relationship strength indicators, and churn predictions

Name: Procurement Intelligence
Description: Spend analytics, supplier performance scores, contract analysis, sourcing opportunities, and price benchmarking

Name: Contract Data and Obligations
Description: Extracted contract terms, clause analysis, risk identifications, obligation tracking, and renewal dates

Name: Invoice and Payment Data
Description: Automated invoice processing results, three-way matching outcomes, exception handling, and payment recommendations

Name: Supplier Risk Scores
Description: Real-time supplier risk monitoring including financial health, compliance status, ESG scores, and disruption warnings

Name: Dispute Classification and Outcomes
Description: AI-powered dispute type classification, outcome predictions, evidence strength scores, and resolution recommendations

Name: Dispute Evidence Packages
Description: Automated evidence collection, document analysis, transaction cross-references, and merchant response evaluations

Name: Dispute Analytics
Description: Pattern analysis, merchant behavior monitoring, first-party fraud detection, and chargeback trend data

Name: Control Test Results
Description: Automated test execution outcomes, evidence validation, control effectiveness ratings, exception tracking, and audit trails

Name: Control Monitoring Data
Description: Real-time control effectiveness tracking, anomaly detection alerts, trend analysis, and deterioration warnings

Name: Financial Spreading Data
Description: Automated financial statement extraction, ratio calculations, trend analysis, peer benchmarking, and credit metrics

Name: Credit Memos and Assessments
Description: GenAI-generated credit memos, policy compliance checks, precedent comparisons, and covenant recommendations

Name: Learning Content and Assessments
Description: AI-generated lessons, quizzes, training materials, multi-modal content (text/audio/video), and automated assessments

Name: Learning Analytics
Description: Learning effectiveness metrics, skill gap analysis, progress tracking, engagement analytics, and competency maps

Name: Collections Propensity Scores
Description: Payment likelihood predictions, roll-rate forecasts, recovery amount estimates, hardship assessments, and arrangement adherence predictions

Name: Collections Communications
Description: GenAI-generated personalized collection letters, conversation scripts, status notifications, and resolution correspondence

Name: Collections Strategy Outcomes
Description: Contact optimization results, channel effectiveness, timing analysis, and reinforcement learning insights

Name: Hardship Application Data
Description: Automated hardship assessment results, financial statement extraction, vulnerability indicators, and affordability analysis

Name: App Personalization Decisions
Description: Real-time personalization choices, contextual content selections, A/B test results, and dynamic UI/UX adaptations

Name: Behavioral Session Data
Description: Real-time session analytics, intent predictions, engagement tracking, feature usage patterns, and sentiment analysis

Name: App Recommendations
Description: Next-best-action suggestions, product recommendations, financial wellness insights, and personalized tips

Name: Experimentation Results
Description: Multi-armed bandit outcomes, champion-challenger performance, optimization insights, and conversion analytics

Name: Model Performance Metrics
Description: MLOps metrics including drift detection, performance degradation, explainability reports, retraining triggers, and champion-challenger results
Consumed By Use Cases: UC-009, UC-015, All ML-intensive use cases
